Text.Page:
I know the cultists are evil, bent on our destruction, determined to bring the demon-god back into the world, and so forth.

But wow, do they ever have top-notch weapon suppliers!

Collect them as you explore the refuge, and bring them back to me. Maybe we can figure out where they got them.
If we can figure out where the cultists get their weapons, maybe we can shut down their supply.
